title: 为啥我/setspawn（可能现在拼错了）之后无效？
author: 名为123的貘

replies.author: 破损的鞘翅
replies.txt_content: 单人的话用/spawnpoint设置复活点，/setworldspawn设置世界的出生点

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
setworldspawn 坐标
spawnpoint 玩家 坐标

setspawn是Classic 0.0.17a至Indev 0.31期间的命令....已被spawnpoint替代

replies.author: xuzhihui
replies.txt_content: 单人的话用/spawnpoint设置复活点，/setworldspawn设置世界的出生点
